# identifier

**Instance Property**

A string identifier for a tab.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var identifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Each identifier must be unique across all the tabs managed by a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBarController].

## Accessing a tab’s appearance

- **title**: A tab’s title.
- **subtitle**: A tab’s subtitle.
- **image**: A tab’s image.
- **badgeValue**: A tab’s badge value.
- **viewController**: The view controller that the system presents when someone selects a tab.
